text: Ibrahima balalena, parthiba jibane tomadera parasparika bhalabasa raksara jan'ye tomara allahara paribarte pratimaguloke upasyarupe grahana karecha. Erapara keyamatera dina tomara eke aparake asbikara karabe ebam eke aparake lanata karabe. Tomadera thikana jahannama ebam tomadera kona sahayyakari ne'i.
